chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Today we will see who has the guts

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Because in this video, I am going to give you all the concepts that we have learnt in the Sigma web development course

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: I am going to give you an exercise based on that

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Which you have to solve

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: And if you have decided that you are going to solve that question

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Then write in the comment section below

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Challenge Accepted

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Everyone write it

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: And also like this video

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Because my energy is high to start this video

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Let's go to the computer screen

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Let's roll the intro

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Intro

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: So guys I have entered the computer screen

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: I have also made a folder named Video 33

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: It is ready

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: And here I am going to tell you

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: What you have to do in this exercise

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: I have officially uploaded the shoutouts of the exercise

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: If you have not seen the video

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: And this time I want to tell you

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: That you will get a shoutout

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Which will write Challenge Accepted in the comment section below

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: So what you have to do in this exercise

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: I am telling you

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: You have to design a navbar

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: And after designing a navbar

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: You have to make a style sheet

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: In which I will change a variable

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: That is, you have to make some global variables

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: And according to those global variables

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: The contrast of your color will change

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: That is, you have to make a multicolored navbar

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: And you can do this simply

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: By using CSS variables

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: I have told you about CSS variables

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: In video number 30

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: By using the concepts told in video number 30

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: You have to make this multicolored navbar

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: I also want to tell you that

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: We will gradually transition

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: To make a full website

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: There are some important concepts

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: After covering that

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Like we have flexbox

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Then we have grid

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Then transitions and animations

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: After all that

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: We will make full-on websites

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: So many people are waiting

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: When will the full-on websites be made

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: And the wait is going to be over very soon

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Let me tell you

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: So I hope you have accessed this playlist

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: And the source code is also being uploaded

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: So you guys do access it too

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: That's all for this video guys

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Thank you so much guys for watching this video

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: And I will see you next time

chunks.title: Exercise 4 - Multi Color Website
chunks.text: Outro Music
